alert.note: Alert for Fall River (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued October 21 at 3:37AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Skies will be partly cloudy today with highs in the upper 60s to mid 70s. Winds will be south to southwest at 10 to 20 mph late this morning and afternoon, with higher gusts across far southwest South Dakota. Relative humidities will drop to 12 to 28 percent in the afternoon, lowest values across far southwest South Dakota. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Saturday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the very high category.
